text: wakadhuluk taab allah ealaa althalathat aladhin khullifu min al'ansar -whum kaeb bin malik wahilal bin 'umyat wmurart bin alrabiea- tkhllafu ean rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasaliman, wahazanuu hznana shdydana, hataa 'iidha daqat ealayhim al'ard bsaeatha ghmmana wndmana bsbb takhlufihim, wadaqat ealayhim 'anfusuhum lima 'asabahum min alhima, wa'ayqinuu 'an laa malja min allah 'iilaa 'iilayhi, wffaqhm allah subhanah wataealaa 'iilaa alttaeat walrujue 'iilaa ma yurdih subhanah. 'iina allah hu altawaab ealaa eibadihi, alrahim bihima
